[ ] (Compatibility with AirConsole`s games, and download its db)
[ ] With same device (uses the multi-display feature)
[ ] With ScreenCast API (loads the primary screen on background and transmits it)
[ ] D2D (Device-to-Device) - Use Dat URL and its first characters
[ ]  
[ ] (Same device is faster than Screencast and uses less resources, and D2D is even faster and combines the power of two devices while using more of Internet than on Same-device)
title: API: Dual Screen (Floflis 7)
